name: Way of the Charging Ram
desc: A straightforward Discipline focused on constant movement and making a large number of _Minor Attacks_. Practitioners of the Way of the Charging Ram always have easy access to _Breach_ and _Rush_ Movement, allowing them to forge their own path across the battlefield. This Discipline excels for characters that want extremely high (if inflexible) mobility and specialize in melee combat.

name: Way of the Coiled Serpent
desc: You are constantly waiting for the opportune moment to strike, punishing any opening within your reach. This Discipline specializes in _Charged_ Attacks, creating flexible _Hazards_ that can be removed at a moment's notice. Rather than utilizing _Charged_ Attacks for increased Damage this Discipline uses them to control an area, heavily discouraging enemy advancement.

name: Way of the Crackling Bolt
desc: You specialize in powerful bolts of lightning, drawing electricity from every corner. This is a straightforward Discipline focused on high damage Area effects that deal _Lightning_ Damage. In addition, it can manipulate the battlefield with _Electrified_ _Terrain_ and is able to better target and punish _Shocked_ foes.

name: Way of the Crashing Stone
desc: A Discipline focused on the forming and firing of stone projectiles with deadly efficiency, creating an avalanche across the battlefield. This Discipline is incredibly dependant on having access to _Earthen_ terrain and obstacles, but on those battlefields it can easily erect defenses and violently rearrange terrain.

name: Way of the Creeping Frost
desc: You drop the temperature rapidly, freezing the terrain and foes alike. This Discipline focuses on inflicting _Frigid_ on as many foes as possible while creating a _Frozen_ sheet of ice, limiting the mobility of enemies with every move. If allies can avoid their _Frozen_ mass, this Discipline can easily lock down a battlefield.

name: Way of the Cunning Fox
desc: This Discipline requires planning and carefully selecting enemies, but provides extensive rewards in those situations. By delaying attacks and carefully selecting your positioning, you can heavily punish foes while minimizing risk to yourself. This Discipline struggles in open spaces, and works best on heavily covered maps.

name: Way of the Destructive Blast
desc: Your explosions are violent and damaging, rending everything near you. This Discipline, contrary to other Flame Disciplines, ignores _Alight_ as much as possible, turning everything into additional Damage. In addition, they can easily destroy cover on the battlefield, allowing them to keep enemy Shapers in check.

name: Way of the Dripping Veil
desc: Water rises and falls constantly around you, shielding you from harm. So long as they have access to a _Water_ _Source_ this Discipline can erect highly mobile and effective defenses that tend to only provide their benefits to allies. When timed correctly, allies near your aquatic barricade can be near-invincible.

name: Way of the Endless Twister
desc: You twist and turn the air, creating vortices of wind that entrap and disorient foes. This Discipline deals very little direct damage but is a master of disorienting and reorienting foes while creating hazardous and manipulative gusts of wind around themselves.

name: Way of the Erupting Flame
desc: You emit powerful bursts of flame, incinerating all before you in a flash. This Discipline focuses on simple firepower, inflicting large amounts of _Alight_ in powerful area effects. This Discipline has premiere access to large area-of-effects and can easily scorch the whole battlefield.

name: Way of the Floating Butterfly
desc: You move with practiced grace, picking your way across the battlefield in opportunistic safety. This Discipline provides exceptional mobility and the ability to inflict status on enemies you move past as well as allowing a great deal of defensive movement.

name: Way of the Flowing Sea
desc: You create a constant flow of water by pushing and pulling, gracefully toppling foes. With access to sufficient _Sources_, this Discipline can built to bigger and bigger attacks, alternating between pushing and pulling to build more power.

name: Way of the Focusing Torch
desc: You continually refine your flames, making them burn hotter and hotter with every moment. Practitioners of this Discipline set themselves _Alight_ to increase the power of _Charged_ effects, defending themselves with a vicious aura of flame.

name: Way of the Furious Bison
desc: You attack with overblown, wide attacks, smashing all in your path. No other Spiritbonded can manage quite the same sturdiness while _Charging_ Attacks and, the more punishment they take, the more powerful the final attack is.

name: Way of the Greedy Rodent
desc: Your keen eyes specialize in finding dangerous features on the battlefield, finding ammunition for allies and opportunities for yourself. Practitioners will find _Opportune_ Weapons everywhere, preparing them for sudden strikes by their allies.

name: Way of the Guiding Shepard
desc: You create paths on the battlefield, moving friend and foe as you wish. This Discipline specializes in moving allies, whether by granting them movement, _Pushing_ and _Pulling_ them, or distracting foes long enough for allies to escape.

name: Way of the Infinite Skate
desc: You use the ice on the ground as a runway, sliding rapidly across the battlefield. This Discipline is _Source_ intensive but, with appropriate access, can freeze an entire battlefield to turn it into their personal skating field.

name: Way of the Lifting Wind
desc: Your wind elevates and supports allies, guiding them across the battlefield. With the ability to place _Updrafts_ to help allies jump across the battlefield and manipulating _Gusting_ spaces to accelerate allies this Discipline ensures your party will be where they need to be quickly.

name: Way of the Lightning Caller
desc: You carefully charge lightning strikes from above, unleashing them to devastating effect at a moment's notice. This Discipline creates _Hazards_ across the battlefield to indicate incoming _Lightning_ attacks, creating a dangerous minefield for foes.

name: Way of the Pack Leader
desc: You lead a pack in battle, directing allies to work in tandem to defeat superior foes. Whenever you are attacking a creature you can direct allies to attack for support, creating openings and focusing down enemies quickly.

name: Way of the Patient Hunter
desc: You carefully analyze foes from a distance before taking a fatal shot. This Discipline sharply restricts your mobility, but in exchange you inflict a great deal of _Studied_ and can concentrate to line up attacks that will drop all but the sturdiest foes.

name: Way of the Proud Osprey
desc: You excel in single combat, forcing a foe to give you all their attention. You can _Mark_ a creature and force them into a one-on-one duel, manipulating them across the battlefield and forcing them to target only you.

name: Way of the Quaking Earth
desc: Your every step shakes the earth, keeping foes off-balance and more easily targeted. While it lacks direct damage, this Discipline can constantly inflict _Reeling_ and _Prone_ while creating _Uneven Earth_ to limit foes' ability to advance.

name: Way of the Rising Spire
desc: You pull the jaws hidden just beneath the earth forward, making the battlefield a jagged arena. This Discipline is a mixture of vicious attacks with created earthen spikes and creating _Jagged_ Terrain that, in addition to its normal effects, puts foes off-balance and limits their defenses.

name: Way of the Roaring Lion
desc: You are a loud and powerful force on the battlefield, inspiring allies as you trade blows. You will inflict _Marked_ on as-many enemies as possible and, with every hit, inspire your allies to fight even harder.

name: Way of the Rousing Songbird
desc: You are a stream of positivity, urging your allies to fight ever harder. This Discipline can provide a great deal of _Momentum_ to allies with _Joyful_ and _Courageous_, while providing additional mobility and healing to all allies.

name: Way of the Spreading Cinders
desc: You carefully stoke the fires around you, slowly building towards a raging inferno. Practitioners create _Blazing_ spaces across the battlefield and can weaponize them, creating flames only to then fling them into a foe.

name: Way of the Stalwart Bastion
desc: You offer your guard to your allies, defending them against all incoming strikes. This Discipline provides minor healing to allies but, more importantly, can act as a bastion, _Parrying_ for nearby allies and providing them a wellspring of _Stamina_.

name: Way of the Stinging Wasp
desc: You are in constant movement while the battle occurs, sliding in and out of foe's reach with impunity. This Discipline rewards quick and sudden action, focusing on getting off _Minor Attacks_ before foes get the chance to respond.

name: Way of the Stone Lock
desc: You have developed your magic into the singular skill of becoming an indestructible bastion of stone and, while your mobility suffers, you can only be harmed by the most dedicated assaults. You dominate the battlefield in your massive suit, literally acting as a mobile wall for allies.

name: Way of the Watching Owl
desc: You keep a careful eye on the battlefield, finding openings in foes and paths for allies. You inflict _Studied_ across the battlefield while finding paths for allies, while providing additional target-marking support for allies.
